jobsJson.additionalPlain:
Gojek is a technology startup based in Jakarta, Indonesia. Specialising in ride-hailing and logistics, we are also the only company in Southeast Asia to be part of Fortune's 50 Companies That Changed the World (2017).

Gojek is a Super App: one app with over 20 services including food delivery, commuting, digital payments, shopping, hyper-local delivery, massages, and many more.

Gojek is Indonesia’s first and fastest growing unicorn building an on-demand empire. Our total of 2,000,000 driver-partners collectively travel 16.5 million KM daily – making us Indonesia’s de-facto transportation choice.

Gojek is a verb! Gojek is a way of life!

lists.content:
• Prepare management reports on a monthly basis and exercise robust analytical on financial statements particularly on profit and loss statements, identify costs and expenses, understand the costs and expenses trend on a month to month basis for both Indonesian and Overseas operation
  • Set-up annual budget including Top-Line (product profitability), OPEX and CAPEX, which align to GOJEK strategies and management goals
  • Work closely with GOJEK Key Stakeholders (Corporate Development, Function head and Production head) to monitor and control the actual performance vs budget
  • Monitor and control the cash flows and cash balance on a periodic basis, prepare periodic cash flow reports (as occurred and projections) for management decision making process for both Indonesian and Overseas operation
  • Support the reporting process for management decision making

• Minimum a Bachelor degree from a reputable university with major in Finance, Accountancy, Banking, Business Management or equivalent
  • At least 6 years of experience in a public accounting firm (Big 4 is preferable) /corporate finance/management consulting/investment bank/private equity
  • Proficient in spreadsheets, databases, MS Office and financial software applications
  • Adept skills on financial modelling and presentation deck preparation is critical
  • Preference given to candidates that currently hold a similar position within a large
  • established corporation
  • Bilingual Bahasa Indonesia and English
  • Strong analytical and planning skills
  • Good communication and presentation skills
  • Excellent problem-solving skills
